works.description:
The copyrighted works are photographs and
 
images of myself, quite often with other people. The photos have been
taken  
with my own camera and are owned by me.

There has been a systemic defamation against me by Bay Area-based elements
 
associated with the Iranian regime and Hezbollah because I run a  
counter-terrorism website  
(http://wiki.islamiccounterterrorism.org/article/Main_Page) that exposes  
their presence in our midst. The aim of these people is to destroy my  
reputation and pressure me.

They have already systemically  used YouTube, Flickr and Twitter to defame
 
me and my business. As such, I would like to request that close the
blogger  
account used to defame in this instance.

BTW, one of these images features me with Vint Cerf, the "Father of the  
Internet" and a Sr. VP at Google.

Also, given that the offenders here have made allegations of terrorism, I 

would like to ask you to please forward the details of this case to the  
local FBI field office (San Jose, CA) for them to investigate this
national  
security matter.
Sincerely,
-Sam Bazzi
415-640-5793
